+TheSpectralForce Yeah I agree. I'm a long time veteran of the series, 
started with Demon's Souls, and I can say with full force Dark Souls 2 is a 
great game, gameplay wise I think it's the best in the series. But let's 
just be honest about it, Dark Souls 2 is best for its gameplay and 
atmosphere, the story is lacking and unfinished.
And concerning what you said about the Herald, there's actually unused 
dialogue for her that would have made things make more sense during the 
game.

+devaloki
It has become quite apparent to me that the overall story was poorly 
constructed in comparison to the first Game. Really disappointing. 
Especially how the Herald tries to throw a bunch of big plot points at you 
at the end of the game. Your character is given no prior knowledge of the 
first flame, so linking fires should mean nothing to your character. And no 
one even knows what the Throne of Want even does. Don't tell me that it 
makes you king, because that's what crowns are for.

+DarkTirk D Nashandra is a remnant of Manus from the first game, reborn. 
Though the rest is unexplained as to what she's trying to do, it's too 
obscure

+epicmumfy  so what is with the throne and the "link the fie" stuff it was 
almost implied that the kingdom was build on  Lordran and that all the lord 
souls were taken. The merchant ladder guy said that Vendrick collected the 
four great souls in dark souls that was Gwyn, Nito, Izalith and Seth.

+noobkaka567 Vendrick has turned into a hollow creature aimlessly walking 
around in the depths of the royal crypts, this is the fate of all who bear 
the curse as you know.. The reaper you see in the end is the queen, in all 
her splendor

this piece of crap should have been dark souls 1 if anything..  Nothing was 
better in DS2 than in the first game﻿

http://darksouls2.wiki.fextralife.com/Manikin+Mask

+Daiemio I don't think that story was ever confirmed.

Its a Manikin enemy ingame, they should have looked like that, but due to 
threats from Naruto's creator Masashi Kishimoto, and the Lawyers of Jump 
Studio (The guys who published the manga) their heads were removed from 
their models, and the player mask you can obtain was changed to a brownish 
grey looking weird mask, nothing like the release trailer's mannequin foes.

+The9220 No one outside of the development team knows why. The whole Naruto 
copyright claim was bullshit.

snippet.authorDisplayName: Old Channel - New Channel in bio
snippet.textDisplay:
Hi guys, I apologize for the obvious spam, but I'm not here advertising my 
own channel, I'm here to quickly mention my friend Frag Janitor, he's 
currently playing dark souls 2, has HD content from a HD PVR, and he 
commentates over all his videos, and for the money and effort he's put in, 
49 subscribers just isn't enough, so please check out his content, maybe a 
few of you will like him. Thankyou. 
https://www.youtube.com/user/FragJanitor﻿

Oh hell no, I wouldn't subscribe to him either. No wonder his channel only 
has 49 subscribers. Do you know why? No, you don't, that's why you are 
advertising for him. A: There is absolutely nothing unique or special about 
how he does his videos. B: He created the same shit that has over saturated 
the f*cking video-commenting market on YouTube. And I know why he missed 
these obvious points because his goal is to get as many subscribers as he 
can. And do you know what happens when you have a lot of subscribers? They 
might watch a video when you post it. So having 10,000 subscribers might 
give you 8000+ views in the first 24 hours. More view, more ads you can 
place and you can earn more money. You think we're all stupid here? You 
think we don't f*cking realize what it is, that you want to accomplish? 
GOOD that 49 subscribers isn't enough, hope it f*cking goes down to 0.

He's been making videos for well over a year and 90% of them have even 
broke 50 views. He's had plenty of time to try different things.

+Nadestraight It's about money and sponsors 
biiiiiaaattttccchhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! 
Leran the hard way not everyday you'll get things handed to you I'll hand 
yuou my tip of my penis though.
No.

+Astronboy the smaller channels do the exact same as the larger ones, in 
general not the other way around.

snippet.authorDisplayName: Old Channel - New Channel in bio
snippet.textDisplay:
+John Smith You clearly don't know what's happened to YouTube then do you? 
Nobody can even see small channels anymore, this is because all the larger 
channels do something exactly the same, and because they've got more subs, 
they grab all the attention, it's difficult to get subs, it's not about 
being 'good' anymore, it's about driving traffic towards your channel
Fuck off. If your 'friend' is any good, he'll get subs.

Will take a look and possibly subscribe. You are a good friend looking out 
for his best interests, good to see.

subscribers just isn't enough' that sentence is saying that he puts money 
and effort in it and 49 subs is not enough, meaning that he is expecting 
something out of it. and since you can't get effort out of it...
